about_the_game:
Enter a world of fear and survival in this thrilling first-person shooter and survival horror game where your mission is clear: eradicate a deadly monster and unravel the mysteries of a haunted, forsaken land. As the tension builds, you'll be forced to scavenge for supplies and fight your way through hostile enemies, all while the lurking terror of a monstrous entity threatens your every step.

Key Features:

  • Survival Horror Gameplay: Experience heart-pounding tension as you face terrifying enemies and a relentless wendigo.

  • Open World Exploration: Uncover hidden mysteries and solve intricate puzzles in a rich, immersive environment.

  • Weapons and Traps: Use weapons and traps to tackle and attack the bandits and the dangerous wendigo. 

  • Dynamic Monster Encounters: The wendigo's attacks are sudden and needs you to be super - responsive.

  • Immersive Storytelling: Unravel the dark history of the place and discover what brought the horror to life.

  • Time Travel: A distinctive form of time travel is introduced in a specific segment of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional blood effects, death and mild horrific elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 from around 2016 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 7 from 2018 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Arm yourself with weapons, traps, and supplies in this survival horror FPS. Battle ruthless bandits and a relentless wendigo as you uncover the truth and fight to survive in this open world horror game.
